messages.subject: Fw:Unschooling family on Nightline tonight!!
messages.msgSnippet: Passing it on! ... From: Ren Allen Date: 10/13/06 11:29:25 To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com Subject: [unschoolingbasics] Unschooling family on Nightline
messages.messageBody:
Passing it on!

-------Original Message-------

From: Ren Allen
Date: 10/13/06 11:29:25
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] Unschooling family on Nightline tonight!!

Hey all,

Some friends of mine are going to be on nightline tonight. For anyone
on EST, Nightline airs on ABC at 11:30pm. Check your local listings
for exact info.

The family being featured is the Barenaked family
(barenakedfamily.com) and some other friends were there during the
filming so they might have a bit of airtime also (freerangefamily.com).

Check it out! Unschoolers on the road, living la vida loca!!:)
Pass this on....

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
